text: Somula is a genus of syrphid flies in the family Syrphidae. There are at least two described species in Somula. Somula decora ==Species== * Somula decora Macquart, 1847 * Somula mississippiensis Hull, 1922 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * ==External links== * Category:Eristalinae
title: Somula
